content: cluck the chicken pot holder crochet pattern by sara sach please add this crochet pattern to your ravelry favorites this crochet pattern is a photo tutorial a written pattern and a video tutorial ***free pattern link *** https //poshpoochdesignsdogclothes blogspot com/2018/05/cluck-chicken-pot-holder-posh-pooch html ***video link *** https //youtu be/_a79x2hwaq0 skill easy materials crochet hook h/ 5 00mm yarn worsted weight 4 or cotton main color mc small amount of red yellow brown yarn needle stitches chain chain slip_stitch sls st single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet skip skip size 9 inches please note if you are using these for wall decoration acrylic yarn is great but if you are using these for putting hot pans or pots on them use cotton yarn acrylic yarn melts easily please do not copy or redistribute this pattern
